name: Adrift through Time
description:
o_________________________________________________________o


A strange and unfamiliar world, lost in the depths of time. Take a dive into the unknown and uncover the strange secrets left adrift.  Explore mysterious caverns and overgrown ruins, as you struggle to recover time long lost.

o_________________________________________________________o

Use special powers to bind time to your will.

Slow and reverse time as you wish, allowing the traversal of strange, ancient ruins. Time holds untold mysteries, but at what cost do these powers come?

o_________________________________________________________o

Deep, dark caverns and mossy ancient ruins await.

o_________________________________________________________o

A peculiar fellow who has made the ultimate discovery.

o_________________________________________________________o

Beautifully mysterious music.

o_________________________________________________________o
